SEARCH
Package org.example.view

Class ViewGUI

java.lang.Object
org.example.view.View
org.example.view.ViewGUI
public class ViewGUI extends View
Concrete class extending View to provide a GUI-based implementation of the view component.

    • getImagePath

      public String getImagePath(org.json.simple.JSONObject card, int dim, int side)
      Gets the image path for a card based on its dimensions and side.
      Parameters:
      card - The card JSON object.
      dim - The dimension of the card (1 for big, 2 for small, 3 for medium).
      side - The side of the card (1 for front, 2 for back).
      Returns:
      The image path as a string.
